Commentary.ab: Y7.3b aēsmi] Kellens, Redard; Geldner aēsma. Instead of aēsmą. Cf. Y7.23b, 24b aēsmi instead of aēsmą and Y7.4 haōmi instead of haōmą. De Vaan, 2003 p. 493, n. 639 -mi as an influence of the ending in daδąmi. Kelllens, 1997 as an evolution of *aēsmə̄ and *haōmə̄.
